column2: Boise Cascade Co. engages in the manufacture and distribution of vertically-integrated wood products and building materials. The company is headquartered in Boise, Idaho and currently employs 5,940 full-time employees. The firm is also a producer of engineered wood products (EWP) and plywood in North America. The firm operates through three segments: Wood Products, Building Materials Distribution, and Corporate and Other. The firm's products are used primarily in new residential construction, residential repair-and-remodeling projects, light commercial construction and industrial applications. The firm manufactures laminated veneer lumber (LVL), I-joists, and laminated beams, which are referred to as EWP. The firm's Building Materials Distribution segment sells a range of building materials, including OSB, plywood and lumber (collectively commodities). The firm's subsidiaries include Boise Cascade Wood Products, L.L.C. and Boise Cascade Building Materials Distribution, L.L.C.
1111 W Jefferson St Ste 300, PO Box 50
